Captain.Title: Bioship Alpha Pilot
Captain.Ability: Each round during the Planning Phase, after all other players have chosen their Maneuvers, target a ship within Range 1 of your ship, look at that ship's chosen Maneuver, and then choose your Maneuver. the target ship's player cannot change the chosen Maneuver after you have looked at it. You may not perform any Actions the round you use this ability.

Captain.Title: Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 1 Drone Token on this card.

Captain.Title: Loskene
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target 1 friendly ship that is not within Range 1-3 of your ship and whose Captain has a lower Skill than Loskene's. Target ship may immediately perform an additional 1 or 2 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn). The additional Maneuver must be on the target ship's Maneuver Dial.

Captain.Title: Soval
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1-2. Remove 1 [SCAN] or [BATTLESTATIONS] Token from beside the target ship. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Tavek
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar.

Captain.Title: Lenaris Holem
Captain.Ability: Each time you are attacked, if you have an [EVASIVE] Token beside your ship, you may re-roll 1 of your defense dice.

Captain.Title: Hazar
Captain.Ability: If your ship is within Range 1 of a Planet Token or an Obstacle, all attacks made against your ship are at -1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 6 Drone Tokens on this card. After you spend a [TARGET LOCK] Token to re-roll your dice, you may spend 3 Drone Tokens to maintain your Target Lock on the target ship (i.e., do not remove the [TARGET LOCK] Tokens from beside either ship).

Captain.Title: Borg Queen
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 8 Drone Tokens on this card. Once per round, you may discard 1 Drone Token to perform 1 Action from your ship's Action Bar as a free Action. If another Borg ship is in your fleet when your ship is destroyed, you may replace that ship's Captain Card with this card. If you do so, discard that Captain Card and all Drone Tokens from both cards. Then place 8 Drone Tokens on this card.

Captain.Title: Gorn Commander
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may convert 1 blank result into 1 [HIT] result.

Captain.Title: K'Nera
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. The target ship may choose to disable one of its [CREW] Upgrades (of its choice). If the target ship chooses not to disable 1 of its [CREW] Upgrades or if it has no [CREW] Upgrades that are not already disabled, you gain +1 attack die to all of your attacks against that ship this round.

Captain.Title: Liviana Charvanek
Captain.Ability: Whenever one of your [CREW] Upgrades is supposed to be disabled, roll 1 defense die. If you roll a [BATTLESTATIONS] result, that Upgrade is not disabled. If you are disabling the [CREW] Upgrade to perform its Action or ability, that Action or ability is still performed even if the Upgrade does not disable.

Captain.Title: Michael Eddington
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 3 Mission Tokens on this card. ACTION: Target a ship a Range 1-3 and discard 1 Mission Token from this card. Target ship rolls -2 attack dice against your ship for each of its attacks this round.

Captain.Title: Gul Damar
Captain.Ability: All attacks made against your ship with Secondary Weapons are at -1 attack die. All attacks made against your ship with Minefields are at -2 attack dice.

Captain.Title: Benjamin Maxwell
Captain.Ability: Immediately before you move, you may change your Maneuver. If you do so, discard this card during the End Phase.

Captain.Title: Mr. Spock
Captain.Ability: Your ship may perform a [TARGET LOCK] or [SCAN] Action as a free Action each round.

Captain.Title: Will Decker
Captain.Ability: During the Modify Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may destroy one of your Active Shields to add 1 additional [CRIT] result to your attack roll.

Captain.Title: Hugh
Captain.Ability: All of your [CREW] Upgrades cost -1 SP. You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning any Borg Upgrades to your ship.

Captain.Title: Lore
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to gain +1 attack die for that attack. You may assign any [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade to your ship, regardless of Faction restriction, and you do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning any [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade to your ship.

Captain.Title: Keevan
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2 in your forward firing arc. Your ship cannot attack any other ship this round and must attack that ship, if possible. During the Combat Phase, if your ship attacks with its Primary Weapon, it resolves its attack immediately before the target ship, as if it had a higher Captain Skill than that ship. If the target ship attacks your ship this round, it gains +4 attack dice.

Captain.Title: Weyoun

Captain.Title: Benjamin Sisko
Captain.Ability: During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, if your ship is in the forward firing arc of 2 or more ships, roll 1 extra defense die against all attacks from those ships. Each time your ship receives a Damage Card (normal or critical), incrase your Captain Skill by +1 for the rest of the game (max +2). The bonus Skill remains even if the damage is later repaired.

Captain.Title: Kuvak

Captain.Title: V'Las

Captain.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not cloaked, all enemy ships at Range 1-3 must attack your ship this round, if possible. When defending against each of these attacks, roll +2 defense dice.

Captain.Ability: When attacking with a Secondary Weapon, you may add +1 attack die to the attack. If you do so, discard that [WEAPON] Upgrade after the attack is completed.

Captain.Title: Martok
Captain.Ability: ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, gain +1 attack die and roll -2 defense dice this round. You may convert 1 of your [HIT] results into a [CRIT] result.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, gain +1 attack die and roll -2 defense dice this round. You may convert 1 of your [HIT] results into a [CRIT] result.

Admiral.Title: James T. Kirk
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable one Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable one Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Admiral.Title: Gul Dukat
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon this round, gain +1 attack die.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon this round, gain +1 attack die.

Admiral.Title: Maxwell Forrest
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Perform an additional 1 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn).
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Perform and additional 1 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn).

Admiral.Title: V'Las
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. Disable 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. Disable 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Admiral.Title: Borg Queen
Admiral.Ability: At the start of the game or if this card replaces another Captain, remove all Drone Tokens from that Captain Card and place 7 Drone Tokens on this card. ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2. Choose 1 Upgrade on that ship and perform that Upgrade's Action as a free Action this round. If that Action requires spending Drone Tokens, spend 1 less Drone Token than required.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2. Choose 1 Upgrade on that ship and perform that Upgrade's Action as a free Action this round. If that Action requires spending Drone Tokens, spend 1 less Drone Token than required.

Admiral.Title: Matthew Dougherty
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 defense die.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Disable 1 of your Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 defense die.

Admiral.Title: Gorkon
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Roll 3 defense dice. For each [EVADE] result, place 1 [EVADE] Token beside your ship. You cannot perform an [EVADE] Action as a free Action this round.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Roll 3 defense dice. For each [EVADE] result, place 1 [EVADE] Token beside your ship. You cannot perform an [EVADE] Action as a free Action this round.

Admiral.Title: Hiren
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Disable 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to gain +1 attack die this round.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Disable 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to gain +1 attack die this round.

Admiral.Title: Worf
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2 with a Hull Value of 3 or less. The target ship immediately makes one free attack with its Primary Weapon against an enemy ship in its forward firing arc. Place an Auxiliarly Power Token beside the target ship.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2 with a Hull Value of 3 or less. The target ship immediately makes one free attack with its Primary Weapon against an enemy ship in its forward firing arc. Place an Auxiliarly Power Token beside the target ship.

Admiral.Title: Mendak
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2 (including your own) that has no [BATTLESTATIONS] Token(s) beside it and place a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside that ship. The target ship cannot perform a [BATTLESTATIONS] Action this round. This card may only be purchased for a Romulan ship.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2 (including your own) that has no [BATTLESTATIONS] Token(s) beside it and place a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside that ship. The target ship cannot perform a [BATTLESTATIONS] Action this round. This card may only be purchased for a Romulan ship.

Admiral.Title: Gul Madred
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-3. If the Captain on the target ship has a lower Skill number than Gul Madred, discard that ship's Captain and Gul Madred. If the Captain on the target ship has a Skill number equal to or greater than Gul Madred, that Captain rolls 2 defense dice. If at least 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result is rolled, do not discard that ship's Captain or Gul Madred.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-3. If the Captain on the target ship has a Skill number of 6 or less, discard that ship's Captain and Gul Madred. If the Captain on the target ship has a Skill number of 7 or higher, that Captain rolls 2 defense dice. If at least 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result is rolled, do not discard that ship's Captain or Gul Madred.

Admiral.Title: Black
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Perform a [SENSOR ECHO] Action with a 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver Template, even if your ship is not cloaked or does not have the [SENSOR ECHO] icon on its Action Bar. Each time you defend this round, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may re-roll one of your blank results. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Perform a [SENSOR ECHO] Action with a 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver Template, even if your ship is not cloaked or does not have the [SENSOR ECHO] icon on its Action Bar. Each time you defend this round, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may re-roll one of your blank results. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Admiral.Title: Gardner
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die this round. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll -1 defense die. You cannot perform free Actions this round.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die this round. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll -1 defense die. You cannot perform free Actions this round.

Admiral.Title: Erik Pressman
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Disable 1 of your [TECH] Upgrade to gain +1 attack die with your Primary Weapon this round. OR ACTION: Discard 1 of your [TECH] Upgrades to gain +2 attack dice with your Primary Weapon this round.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Disable 1 of your [TECH] Upgrade to gain +1 attack die with your Primary Weapon this round. OR FLEET ACTION: Discard 1 of your [TECH] Upgrades to gain +2 attack dice with your Primary Weapon this round.

Admiral.Title: Jaro Essa
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Discard 1 of your Bajoran [CREW] Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll 2 additional dice. This card may only be purchased for a Bajoran ship.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Discard 1 of your Bajoran [CREW] Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll 2 additional dice. This card may only be purchased for a Bajoran ship.

Admiral.Title: Martok
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, gain +1 attack die and roll -2 defense dice this round. You may convert 1 of your [HIT] results into a [CRIT] result.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, gain +1 attack die and roll -2 defense dice this round. You may convert 1 of your [HIT] results into a [CRIT] result.

Upgrade.Title: Worf
Upgrade.Ability: Disable this card to re-roll your entire attack roll. You must re-roll all of the dice and keep the results of the second roll.

Upgrade.Title: Miles O'Brien
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to disable any 1 Upgrade on another ship at Range 1-3. This ability may be used against a ship that is Cloaked.

Upgrade.Title: Geordi La Forge
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship has a [SCAN] Token beside it, you may force one ship you attacked this round to re-roll one defense die of your choice.

Upgrade.Title: Data
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Place 2 [EVASION] Tokens beside your ship and reduce our total attack dice by 2 this round. You cannot perform an [EVASION] Action this round, even as a free Action.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert 1 of your [BATTLE STATIONS] results into a [CRITICAL] result. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Antimatter Mines
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Discard this card and place a Minefield Token in your rear firing arc at Range 1. If you place this token on a ship, or if a ship enters the minefield, roll 4 attack dice. Any [HIT] or [CRITICAL] damages the ship as normal. The affected ship does not roll any defense dice.

Upgrade.Title: Konmel
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, you may repair 1 Shield Token.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes (Vor'cha Bonus)

Upgrade.Title: N'Vek

Upgrade.Title: Bochra

Upgrade.Title: Plasma Torpedoes

Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, repair 1 Shield Token and reduce your total attack dice by 2 this round.

Upgrade.Title: Joachim

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes

Upgrade.Title: Parem
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you ship is not Cloaked, disable all your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard Parem and one [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Varel

Upgrade.Title: Sabotage

Upgrade.Title: Korax
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not cloaked, disable all your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard Korax and any 2 [CREW] Upgrades of your choice on the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Cyrano Jones
Upgrade.Ability: You begin the game with one Tribble Token beside your Ship Card

Upgrade.Title: Klingon Boarding Party

Upgrade.Ability: If a [SCAN] Token is beside your ship, add +1 attack die when firing against a ship that has no Active Shields.

Upgrade.Ability: If your ship has a [SCAN] Token beside it when you attack, you may convert 1 blank result into [HIT] result.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Energy Dissipator
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, the target suffers no damage, receives 1 Energy Dampening Token, and you may immediately attack the same ship again with another weapon. This upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points for any non-Breen ship.

Upgrade.Title: Conditional Surrender

Upgrade.Title: EM Pulse
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not in your forward firing arc. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside the target ship. The target ship rolls 2 less attack dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Farek
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields to target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Upgrade.Title: Missile Launchers

Upgrade.Title: Defense Condition One

Upgrade.Title: Romulan Pilot
Upgrade.Ability: After you move, you may discard this card to place a [SCAN] Token beside your ship as a free Action. If you do so, you may immediately make an additional Green Maneuver.

Upgrade.Title: Additional Weapons Array
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to make this attack. You may convert 1 of your [BATTLESTATION] results into 1 [CRITICAL] result.

Upgrade.Title: Nullifier Core
Upgrade.Ability: Each time you defend while Cloaked, you may re-roll 1 of your defense dice. Discard this card if you ship sustains any damage to its Hull.

Upgrade.Title: Quantum Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your [TARGET LOCK] and disable this card to perform this attack. If the target ship is hit, add 1 [HIT] result to your total damage. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Cloaking Device
Upgrade.Ability: Instead of performing a normal Action, you may disable this card to perform the [CLOAK] Action. While you have a [CLOAK] token beside your ship, you may perform the [SENSOR ECHO] Action even if this card is disabled. This Upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points for any ship other than the U.S.S. Defiant.

Upgrade.Title: Worf
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. That ship rolls 2 less attack dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Attack Pattern Delta
Upgrade.Ability: Disable this card to re-roll your entire defense roll. You must re-roll all of the dice and keep the results of the second roll.

Upgrade.Title: Jadzia Dax
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to perform an additional "2" maneuver this round (forward or bank). You cannot attack this round.

Upgrade.Title: Miles O'Brien
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to repair 2 Shield Tokens. You cannot attack this round.

Upgrade.Title: Once More Unto The Breach
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to allow your Primary Weapon to make a total of 2 attacks this round at -1 attack die each. You may not roll any defense dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Concussive Charges
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. For every uncanceled [HIT] or [CRITICAL] result, the target ship loses 1 token of your choice that has been placed beside it in the play area. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert 1 of your [BATTLE STATIONS] results into a [CRITICAL] result. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Kerla
Upgrade.Ability: When defending against a ship at Range 1, you may convert 1 of your [BATTLESTATION] results into 1 [EVASIVE] result.

Upgrade.Title: Stex
Upgrade.Ability: If a [CREW] Upgrade on an enemy ship would cause your ship to discard or disable any of your Upgrades, roll 2 defense dice. If you roll at least 1 [EVASIVE] result, ignore the effects of the enemy Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Cloaked Mines
Upgrade.Ability: During the Planning Phase, you may discard this card to place a Minefield Token within Range 2 of your ship (in any direction) but not within Range 2 of an Enemy ship. If an enemy ship passes within Range 1 of the token, roll 3 attack dice (-1 if the target ship immediately performs a [SCAN] Action). Any [HIT] or [CRITICAL] damages the target ship as normal. The affected ship does not roll any defense dice.

Upgrade.Title: Polarized Hull Plating
Upgrade.Ability: When your ship is hit, convert 1 [CRITICAL] into 1 [HIT] result.

Upgrade.Title: Nuclear Missiles
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may re-roll one of your blank results one time.

Upgrade.Title: Long Range Tachyon Scan
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking a ship at Range 3, you may spend 1 [SCAN] Token to force that ship to roll 2 less defense dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Suicide Attack

If your ship overlaps an enemy ship, destroy your ship and roll 8 attack dice to damage the enemy ship. That ship rolls defense dice against this attack. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Jem'Hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Phased Polaron Beam
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. All damage inflicted by this attack ignores the opposing ship's Shields. This Upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points for any non-Jem'Hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Omet'Iklan
Upgrade.Ability: Whenever you attack with your Primary Weapon, you may convert 1 result into a [HIT] result. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Jem'hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Virak'Kara
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable this card and 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship (even if that ship is Cloaked or has Active Shields). You may then use that Upgrade's Action (if any) as a free Action this round. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Jem'hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Toman'Torax
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Discard this card and 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship (even if that ship is Cloaked or has Active Shields. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Jem'hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Redshirt
Upgrade.Ability: When defending, discard this card to cancel any one of your opponent's attack dice of your choice.

Upgrade.Title: N'Garen
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: When attacking this round, you may convert 1 of your [BATTLE STATIONS] results into a [CRITICAL] result all all of your other [BATTLE STATIONS] results into [HIT] results.

Upgrade.Title: Alexander
Upgrade.Ability: Each time your ship is hit for at least 1 damage, place 1 [BATTLE STATIONS] Token on this card. During the Activation Phase, you may take 1 [BATTLE STATIONS] Token off this card and place it beside your ship.

Upgrade.Title: EM Pulse
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to target a ship at Range 1-2. The targeted ship rolls 1 less attack die and 1 less defense die this round.

Upgrade.Title: Boheeka
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship has a [BATTLE STATIONS] Token beside it when you attack, you may convert 1 blank result into 1 [HIT] result.

Upgrade.Title: Enhanced Weaponry
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: (Target Lock) Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. If fired from a Keldon Class ship, add +1 attack die.

Upgrade.Title: Dorsal Weapons Array
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon in any direction.

Upgrade.Title: Tetryon Emissions
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this Upgrade to add +3 defense dice each time you defend this round.

Upgrade.Title: Cloaking Device
Upgrade.Ability: Instead of performing a normal Action, you may disable this card to perform the [CLOAK] Action. While you have a [CLOAK] token beside your ship, you may perform the [SENSOR ECHO] Action even if this card is disabled. This Upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points for any non-Keldon class ship.

Upgrade.Title: Captured Intelligence
Upgrade.Ability: Before rolling your defense dice, if you do not have an [EVASIVE] Token beside your ship, you may discard this card to place an [EVASIVE] Token beside your ship. In addition, each time you defend during the round use this ability, roll 1 extra defense die.

Upgrade.Title: Feint
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this upgrade to target a ship at range 2-3. If you attack that ship this round, it rolls 2 less defense dice.

Upgrade.Title: Dmitri Valtane
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship has a [SCAN] token beside it when you attack, you may re-roll up to 2 of your attack dice.

Upgrade.Title: Janice Rand
Upgrade.Ability: After your ship moves, discard Rand to allow your captain to perform the action on one of his [TALENT] upgrades as a free action this round.

Upgrade.Title: Lojur
Upgrade.Ability: When your ship fires a [WEAPON] upgrade that requires you to disable it, you may disable Lojur instead of that [WEAPON] upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Positron Beam
Upgrade.Ability: During the planning phase, you may discard this upgrade to target a ship at range 1 of your ship. That ship immediately receive an auxiliary power token.

Upgrade.Title: Transwarp Drive
Upgrade.Ability: During the activation phase, if your maneuver dial reveals a [STRAIGHT] 4 or [STRAIGHT] 5 maneuver, you may instead use a [STRAIGHT] 6 maneuver.

Upgrade.Title: Massacre
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship inflicts a [CRITICAL] against an enemy's Hull, discard this card to inflict 1 additional damage to that ship.

Upgrade.Title: Selok
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard Selok to target a ship at Range 1. That ship cannot attack your ship this round.

Upgrade.Title: Ultritium Explosives
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard this card and 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to inflict 1 [CRITICAL] against the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Disobey Orders
Upgrade.Ability: You may discard this card at any time to replace 1 [EVASIVE] [SCAN] or [BATTLE STATIONS] token next to your ship with a [EVASIVE] [SCAN] or [BATTLE STATIONS] token.

Upgrade.Title: Christopher Hobson
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Gain +1 attack die when firing at a cloaked ship.

Upgrade.Title: Secondary Torpedo Launcher
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Discard this card and spend your target lock to perform this attack. If you have already fired another torpedo at an enemy ship in your forward firing arc this round, you may use this weapon to make a second attack against that ship at -1 attack die. you do not need to spend a second target lock to make the extra attack.

Upgrade.Title: High Energy Sensor Sweep
Upgrade.Ability: After you move, you may disable 1 active shield to perform a free [SCAN] Action.

Upgrade.Title: Invaluable Advice
Upgrade.Ability: Before rolling your attack or defense dice, you may discard this card to place a [BATTLE STATIONS] Token beside your ship.

Upgrade.Title: Breen Guards
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Disable Breen Guards and discard one [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Cold Storage Unit
Upgrade.Ability: Add 2 additional [WEAPON] icons to your ship's Upgrade Bar.

Upgrade.Title: Marla Gilmore
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Disable this card and 1 [TECH] of your choice on the target ship. You may then use that Upgrade's Action (if any) as a free action this round.

Upgrade.Title: Noah Lessing
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card and any 1 of your [TECH] Upgrades to target a ship at Range 1-2. Disable 1 of the target ship's Active Shields.

Upgrade.Title: Emergency Medical Hologram
Upgrade.Ability: This Upgrade counts as either a [CREW] Upgrade or a [TECH] Upgrade (your choice). When you use a [TECH] Upgrade that requires you to disable it, you may disable this card instead of that [TECH] Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Emergency Medical Hologram
Upgrade.Ability: This Upgrade counts as either a [CREW] Upgrade or a [TECH] Upgrade (your choice). When you use a [TECH] Upgrade that requires you to disable it, you may disable this card instead of that [TECH] Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Navigational Deflector
Upgrade.Ability: When taking damage, you may discard this card to cancel 1 [HIT] result. If the damage is from a minefield or an obstacle, disable this card instead of discarding it. If you disable this card, you may roll defense dice against obstacles or minefields.

Upgrade.Title: Klingon Honor
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to add +1 attack die and convert 1 [HIT] result into 1 [CRITICAL] result during any one attack you initiate this round. You cannot roll any defense dice this round. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Klingon Captain.

Upgrade.Title: Bu'Kah
Upgrade.Ability: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, discard this card to repair up to 2 damage to your Hull.

Upgrade.Title: Shockwave
Upgrade.Ability: Instead of moving normally during the Activation Phase, you may discard this card and disable 1 of your Torpedoes to disregard your chosen Maneuver and perform a Red [REVERSE] 1 Full Astern Maneuver instead. This upgrade may only be purchased for a Raptor Class ship.

Upgrade.Title: Tactical Sensors
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to place a [BATTLE STATIONS] token and a [SCAN] Token beside your ship. This upgrade may only be purchased for a Raptor class ship.

Upgrade.Title: Centurion
Upgrade.Ability: When one of your [CREW] upgrades or your Captain is to be disabled or discarded, you may discard this card instead.

Upgrade.Title: Romulan Officer
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card. If you initiate an attack while Cloaked this round, add +2 attack dice. You cannot roll any defense dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Decoy
Upgrade.Ability: When defending, before any dice are rolled, you may discard this card and any of your [WEAPON] or [TECH] Upgrades to force your opponent to roll 3 less attack dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Double Back
Upgrade.Ability: After performing a [SENSOR ECHO] Action, you may discard this card to immediately perform a [REVERSE] 1 or [REVERSE] 2 Full Astern Maneuver.

Upgrade.Title: Plasma Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may re-roll all your blank results one time. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Nuclear Warhead
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: At the end of the Activation Phase, discard this card and place a Minefield Token within Range 1 of your ship, but not within your forward firing arc and not on top of another ship. If a ship enters the minefield on a future turn, roll 3 attack dice. Any [HIT] or [CRITICAL] damages the ship as normal. The affected ship does not roll any defense dice.

Upgrade.Title: Kudak'Etan
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Discard this card and disable 1 of your other [CREW] Upgrades to disable all [CREW] Upgrades on the target ship (even if that ships is Cloaked or has Active Shields). This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Jem'hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Ixtana'Rax
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to flip over all Critical Damage cards assigned to your ship.

Upgrade.Title: Ikat'Ika
Upgrade.Ability: When defending , you may discard this card to force one ship that attacks you this round to re-roll any number of their attack dice of your choice (once per die). This Upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points for any non-Jem'hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. If fired from a Jem'Hadar Battleship add +2 attack dice.

Upgrade.Title: Ketracel-White
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to remove all Disabled Upgrade Tokens from all of your Dominion [CREW] Upgrades.

Upgrade.Title: Shroud
Upgrade.Ability: If one of your Dominion [CREW] Upgrades is supposed to be discarded, discard this card instead.

Upgrade.Title: Phased Polaron Beam
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. All damage inflicted by this attack ignores the opposing ship's Shields. This Upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points for any non-Jem'Hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Blockade
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target all friendly ships within range 1 of your ship (including your ship). Target ships gain +1 attack die and +1 defense die this round.

Upgrade.Title: I Am Kohn-Ma
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard the card to target a ship at Range 1-3. Disable one upgrade of your choice on the target ship. This upgrade may only be purchased for a Bajoran Captain.

Upgrade.Title: Li Nalas
Upgrade.Ability: You may disable Li Nalas to prevent 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades or Captain Card from being disabled this round. OR You may discard Li Nalas to prevent 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades Or Captain Card from being discard this round.

Upgrade.Title: Day Kannu
Upgrade.Ability: During the Activation Phase, you may discard this card to perform an additional Action from your Action Bar as a free Action.

Upgrade.Title: Ablative Generator
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Place or remove the Ablative Generator Token beside your ship. This Upgrade may only be purchased for the U.S.S. Voyager.

Upgrade.Title: B'elanna Torres
Upgrade.Ability: Add 1 additional [WEAPON] icon and 1 additional [TECH] icon to your ship's Upgrade Bar.

Upgrade.Title: Bio-Electric Interference
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target all other ships within range 1-3 of your ship. Target ships must discard all Tokens that are placed beside their ships except for Auxiliary Power Tokens. A ship that discards a [CLOAK] Token may immediately raise its Shields. In addition your ship cannot be target locked this round. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 ship.

Upgrade.Title: Bio-Neural Circuitry
Upgrade.Ability: After your roll the dice for any reason, you may disable this Upgrade to re-roll the dice. You must re-roll all of the dice and keep the results of the second roll.

Upgrade.Title: Borg Ablative Hull Armor
Upgrade.Ability: When Defending, convert all of your opponents [CRITICAL] results info [HIT] and place all the damage cards that your ship receives beneath this card. Once there are 4 damage cards beneath this card, discard this Upgrade and all damage cards beneath it. All excess damage affects the ship as normal.

Upgrade.Title: Borg Assimilation Tubules
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card and discard 1 Drone Token to target a ship at Range 1-2 Steal 1 [CREW], [TECH], or [WEAPON] Upgrade from the target ship, even if it exceeds your ship's restrictions. Place a Disabled Upgrade Token on the assimilated Upgrade. You cannot steal a Species 8472 Upgrade with this Action.

Upgrade.Title: Borg Tractor Beam
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Place one white Borg Tractor Beam Token beside that ship and the corresponding green Borg Tractor Beam Token (the one that matches the white token's letter) beside your ship.

Upgrade.Title: Extraordinary Immune Response
Upgrade.Ability: When you defend, you may discard this card to roll 1 extra defense die for every damage card that is by your Ship Card. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 ship.

Upgrade.Title: Feedback Pulse
Upgrade.Ability: When defending, before any dice are rolled, you may discard this card to declare that half of the damage from this attack will be cancelled and the other half will be assigned to the attacker (round down); you receive no damage. The attacking ship cannot receive critical damage from this effect. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Upgrade.Title: Harry Kim
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable Harry to repair 1 Shield Token.

Upgrade.Title: Kazon Raiding Party
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking, if you inflict at least 2 damage you may discard this card to reduce the damage to exactly 1 critical damage that ignores the opposing ship's Shields. Disable 1 [TECH] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship and then steal that Upgrade, even if it exceeds your ship's requirements. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Kazon ship.

Upgrade.Title: Masking Circuitry
Upgrade.Ability: Instead of performing a normal Action, you may disable this card to perform the [CLOAK] Action. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. While you have a [CLOAK] Token beside your ship, you may perform the [SENSOR ECHO] Action even if this card is disabled. This Upgrade cost +5 Squadron Points for any ship other than a Kazon ship.

Upgrade.Title: Quantum Singularity
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to remove your ship from the play area and discard all Tokens that are beside your ship except for Auxiliary Power Tokens. During the End Phase, place your ship back in the play area. You cannot place your ship within Range 1-3 of any other ship. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 ship.

Upgrade.Title: Sacrifice
Upgrade.Ability: Before rolling the dice during an attack or defense, you may discard this Upgrade and disable your Captain in order to choose the results of two dice. These dice cannot be re-rolled for the remainder of this attack.

Upgrade.Title: Seska
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 2-3 Disable Seska and 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship. This ability can be used against a ship that is Cloaked.

Upgrade.Title: Seven of Nine
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to add up to 2 Drone Tokens your Captain Card. You may not exceed your starting number of Drone Tokens.

Upgrade.Title: Seven of Nine
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable Seven of Nine to place 1 Adaptation Token on any [TECH] Upgrade on an enemy ship within Range 1-2. You cannot use this Action against a Species 8472 [TECH] Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: The Doctor
Upgrade.Ability: The Doctor counts as either a [CREW] Upgrade or a [TECH] Upgrade (your choice). ACTION: Remove all Disabled Upgrade tokens from your [CREW] Upgrades.

Upgrade.Title: The Doctor
Upgrade.Ability: The Doctor counts as either a [CREW] Upgrade or a [TECH] Upgrade (your choice). ACTION: Remove all Disabled Upgrade tokens from your [CREW] Upgrades.

Upgrade.Title: The Weak Will Perish
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, after rolling your attack dice, you may discard this card and disable your Captain Card to choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them up to 2 times. This Upgrade cost +5 Squadron Points for any ship other than a Species 8472 ship.

Upgrade.Title: Tierna
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard Tierna and roll 2 attack dice. The target ship takes normal damage to its Hull for each [HIT] or [CRITICAL] result. The target ship does not roll any defense dice against this attack.

Upgrade.Title: Tom Paris
Upgrade.Ability: When defending, your ship rolls 1 extra defense die.

Upgrade.Title: Tuvok
Upgrade.Ability: When firing a Secondary Weapon, you may disable Tuvok to roll 1 extra attack die.

Upgrade.Title: Biological Attack
Upgrade.Ability: At the end of the Activation Phase, if your ship base is touching an enemy ship base, you may discard this Upgrade and disable your Captain Card to inflict 1 critical damage to the enemy ship's Hull (even if it has Active Shields). Then disable 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the enemy ship. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 ship.

Upgrade.Title: Cutting Beam
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK. You must have the target ship held in a Borg Tractor Beam (i.e. the target ship must have the white Borg Tractor Beam Token beside its ship and your must have the corresponding green Borg Tractor Beam Token beside your ship) and disable this card to perform this attack. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Borg Ship.

Upgrade.Title: Energy Blast
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. If fired from a Species 8472 Bioship, add +2 attack dice.

Upgrade.Title: Energy Focusing Ship
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Discard this card to perform this attack. Target all friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship that have not yet attacked this round. Target ships cannot make a normal attack this round. Instead, add +2 attack dice to your attack roll for this attack for each targeted ship. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship and each of the target ships. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 ship.

Upgrade.Title: Photonic Charges
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. Place an Auxiliary Token beside the target ship if there at least 1 uncancelled [HIT] or [CRITICAL] result.

Upgrade.Title: Transphasic Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs. This Upgrade may only be purchased for the U.S.S. Voyager.

Upgrade.Title: Tholian Punctuality
Upgrade.Ability: When you initiate an attack, you may discard this card to gain +1 attack die for that attack. This upgrade may only be purchased by Loskene or any other Tholian Captain.

Upgrade.Title: Energy Web
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you performed a 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver this round, you may place 1 Energy Web Token in the play area behind your ship. This upgrade may only be purchased for a Tholian Ship.

Upgrade.Title: Plasma Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may re-roll all of your blank results one time. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Red Alert
Upgrade.Ability: When you spend a [BATTLE STATIONS] Token, you may discard this card instead of returning the [BATTLE STATIONS] Token to the Action Token supply.

Upgrade.Title: Muroc
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target a ship at Range 1-2 and roll 2 attack dice. For every [HIT] and [CRITICAL] result, disable 1 Active Shield on the target ship. If the target ship is Cloaked, a [HIT] result flips that ship's [CLOAK] Token over to its red side.

Upgrade.Title: T'Pol
Upgrade.Ability: When defending, if you have a [SCAN] Token beside your ship, you may spend that token to re-roll up to 2 of your defense dice.

Upgrade.Title: Auxiliary Control Room
Upgrade.Ability: At any time, you may disable this card to remove 1 Auxiliary Power Token from beside your ship.

Upgrade.Title: Sensor Grid
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target one other friendly ship within Range 1-3 of your ship. Place a [SCAN] Token and an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship and the target ship. If you do so, every Cloaked enemy ship that is within Range 1-2 of your ship must immediately flip its [CLOAK] Token over to its red side.

Upgrade.Title: Vulcan High Command
Upgrade.Ability: Add 2 [TECH] Upgrade slots to your Upgrade Bar. The additional Upgrade slots may be either [CREW] or [TECH] Upgrades. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Vulcan Captain on a Vulcan ship. If the Vulcan Captain Card is every removed from your ship, discard this Upgrade and then discard Upgrades from your ship one at a time until all of your Upgrades are supported by your ship's Upgrade Bar.

Upgrade.Title: Vulcan High Command
Upgrade.Ability: Add 1 [TECH] and 1 [CREW] Upgrade slots to your Upgrade Bar. The additional Upgrade slots may be either [CREW] or [TECH] Upgrades. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Vulcan Captain on a Vulcan ship. If the Vulcan Captain Card is every removed from your ship, discard this Upgrade and then discard Upgrades from your ship one at a time until all of your Upgrades are supported by your ship's Upgrade Bar.

Upgrade.Title: Vulcan High Command
Upgrade.Ability: Add 2 [CREW] Upgrade slots to your Upgrade Bar. The additional Upgrade slots may be either [CREW] or [TECH] Upgrades. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Vulcan Captain on a Vulcan ship. If the Vulcan Captain Card is every removed from your ship, discard this Upgrade and then discard Upgrades from your ship one at a time until all of your Upgrades are supported by your ship's Upgrade Bar.

Upgrade.Title: Neela
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-3 and roll 3 attack dice. If you roll at least 1 [CRITICAL] result, inflict 1 critical damage to the target ship's Hull. If you damaged the target ship with this Action, discard this card. If you did not damage the target ship with this Action, disable this card.

Upgrade.Title: Anara
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to repair 1 damage to your Hull

Upgrade.Title: Warp Drive Refit
Upgrade.Ability: During the Activation Phase, if you reveal a 3 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver, you may use a 4 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver instead. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a ship that does not have a 4 or higher on its Maneuver Dial.

Upgrade.Title: Maneuverability
Upgrade.Ability: During the Activation Phase, if you reveal a 1 [TURN RIGHT], a 1 [TURN LEFT] or a [COME ABOUT] Maneuver, you may use the Full About [FULL ABOUT] Maneuver Template instead. If you do so, treat this as a Red Maneuver. After performing any maneuver, you may overlap a Planet Token (i.e. you do not move back along your Maneuver Template). While you are overlapping a Planet Token, you can still perform Actions, attack without penalty, and be attacked (although you roll +1 defense die). This Upgrade costs +5 SP for any ship other than a Bajoran Interceptor.

Upgrade.Title: Militia
Upgrade.Ability: At the start of the Combat Phase, you may discard this card to place a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside your ship (even if there is already one there). In addition, if this Upgrade is equipped to a Bajoran ship with a Bajoran Captain, you gain +2 attack dice to your first attack made during the round in which you use this Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Four of Twelve
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card and 1 of your Drone Tokens to target a ship within Range 1-3. Remove any 1 Token ([EVASIVE], [SCAN], [BATTLESTATIONS], or blue [TARGET LOCK]) from beside the target ship. Then place one [SCAN] token beside your ship. If you removed a blue [TARGET LOCK] Token with this Action, also remove the corresponding red [TARGET LOCK] Token from the play area as well.

Upgrade.Title: Borg Alcove
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Add 1 Drone Token to your Captain Card. You cannot exceed your Captain's starting number of Drone Tokens.

Upgrade.Title: Assimilated Access Codes
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target a ship at Range 2-3, and then discard up to 3 Drone Tokens from your Captain Card. Disable a number of Active Shields on the target ship equal to the number of Drone Tokens that you discarded with this Action. If the target ship is Cloaked, you may instead discard 2 Drone Tokens to flip the target ship's [CLOAK] Token over to its red side. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Borg Captain.

Upgrade.Title: Self Destruct Sequence
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: You cannot attack this round. During the next Activation Phase, you cannot move or take any Actions (including free Actions). At the end of the next Activation Phase, after all ships have moved, destroy your ship and roll a number of attack dice equal to your Hull value to damage every ship within Range 1-3 of your ship. A ship does not roll defense dice against this attack unless that ship has a [SCAN] Token beside it.

Upgrade.Title: Photonic Weapon
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may re-roll one of your blank results. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Aft Particle Beam
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. You may only fire this weapon from your rear firing arc.

Upgrade.Title: Phaser Strike
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: During the Combat Phase, you may attack with this Weapon as if you had a Captain Skill of 10. ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. Range combat bonuses apply to this attack. This upgrade may only be purchased for a ship with a Hull value of 3 or less and costs +5 SP for any ship other than a Bajoran Interceptor.

Upgrade.Title: Full Assault
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. You must divide this attack between 2 or 3 different ships; you may divide your attack dice however you like, but you must roll at least 2 attack dice against each ship. If fired from a Borg Tactical Cube, add +3 attack dice.

Upgrade.Title: Borg Missile
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. The target ship does not sustain normal damage from this attack. Instead, place 1 Auxillary Power Token beside the target ship AND destroy 1 of its Active Shields for each [HIT] or [CRIT] result. The target ship does not roll defense dice against this attack. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Borg ship.

Upgrade.Title: Jammed Communications
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: All ships within Range 1-3 of your ship (including your own) cannot provide or benefit from any text abilities that affect other friendly ships this round. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Upgrade.Title: Gorn Pilot
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you performed a straight Maneuver this round, you may disable this card to immediately perform an additional 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver.

Upgrade.Title: Impulse Overload
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target a ship at Range 1 of your ship and roll 3 attack dice. If you roll at least 1 [HIT] or [CRIT] result, the target ship must discard 1 [TECH] Upgrade (of its choice).

Upgrade.Title: Faked Messages
Upgrade.Ability: During the planning phase, after every ship's maneuver has been chosen, you may discard this card to target 1 enemy ship that is not within Range 1-3 of your ship. Force that ship to change its chosen maneuver to a 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver.

Upgrade.Title: Full Alert
Upgrade.Ability: Full Alert: Action: Discard this card to place 1 [EVASIVE] Token, 1 [SCAN] Token, 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] Token, and 1 Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. Your ship cannot perform any free Actions during the same round that you perform this Action (either before or after you perform this Action).

Upgrade.Title: Kunivas
Upgrade.Ability: During the Modify Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard this card to add 1 additional [HIT] result.

Upgrade.Title: Qapla'
Upgrade.Ability: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, before rolling any of your attack dice, you may discard this card to select one of your attack dice and set it on the side of your choice. That die cannot be rolled or re-rolled during the round in which you use this Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Tritium Intermix
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to flip all of your critical damage cards face down and then repair 1 damage to your ship's Hull. You may perform an [EVASIVE] Action as a free Action this round.

Upgrade.Title: Tal
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking a ship with a [SCAN] Token beside it, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may disable this card to gain +1 attack die.

Upgrade.Title: Advanced Cloaking
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking while you are Cloaked, if there are no Auxiliary Power Tokens beside your ship, you may place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship before rolling any dice to keep your [CLOAK] Token from flipping to its red side.

Upgrade.Title: Lon Suder
Upgrade.Ability: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may disable this card and spend a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token to add +1 additional attack die to your attack.

Upgrade.Title: Direct Command
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card and spend your Target Lock to gain +2 attack dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Sakonna
Upgrade.Ability: Add 1 additional [WEAPON] Updrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. All of your [WEAPON] Upgrades with a cost of 5 or less cost -2 SP.

Upgrade.Title: Hijack
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not cloaked and has no Active Shields. Disable all of your remaining Shields and 1 [CREW] Upgrade on the target ship. Then steal 1 face up [TECH] or [WEAPON] Upgrade Card of your choice from that ship, even if the Upgrade exceeds your ship's restrictions.

Upgrade.Title: Seskal
Upgrade.Ability: If all your Shields have been destroyed, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase you may disable this card to gain +2 attack dice.

Upgrade.Title: First Strike
Upgrade.Ability: During the Combat Phase, if you have 2 or more enemy ships in your forward firing arc within Range 1-3, you may discard this card to treat your Captain's Skill Number as a 10 until the End Phase. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a ship with a Hull Value of 3 or less.

Upgrade.Title: Ion Thrusters
Upgrade.Ability: During the Activation Phase, after you reveal a straight Maneuver, you may disable this card to add +1 to the Maneuver's number (i.e. a 2 becomes a 3, a 3 becomes a 4, etc). No ship may be equipped with more than 1 Ion Thrusters Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Preemptive Strike
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target a ship at Range 2-3 in forward firing arc and roll 3 attack dice. Any [HIT] or [CRIT] damages the target ship as normal. The target ship rolls defense dice against this attack.

Upgrade.Title: Elizabeth Shelby
Upgrade.Ability: During the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may re-roll one of your blank results. If you are defending against an attack from a Borg ship, you roll +1 defense die during the Roll Defense Dice step and you may re-roll all of your blank results during the Modify Defense Dice step.

Upgrade.Title: Reginald Barclay
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card and roll 3 defense dice. For each [EVADE] result, repair 1 damage to your Hull. If you repair 2 or more damage with this Action in a single round, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. If you repair 3 damage with this Action in a single round, discard this card.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Plasma Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Focused Particle Beam
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, if you roll a [HIT] or [CRIT] result on each one of your dice with this attack, continue rolling 1 additional attack die, one-at-a-time, until you do not roll a [HIT] or [CRIT] result (max 3 additional dice). Add all [HIT] or [CRIT] results from the additional dice to your total for this attack. Any Blank or [BATTLESTATIONS] results from the additional dice are not added.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: The Needs of the Many...
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card and one of your [CREW] Upgrades with an SP cost of 3 or higher to repair up to 3 of your Shields.

Upgrade.Title: Leonard McCoy
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Remove 2 Disabled Upgrade Tokens from your [CREW] Upgrades.

Upgrade.Title: Saavik
Upgrade.Ability: You may disable this card at any time to replace 1 [SCAN] or [BATTLESTATIONS] Token that is beside your ship with 1 [EVADE] Token.

Upgrade.Title: Ilia
Upgrade.Ability: You do not lose your Perform Actions step when you overlap another ship's base.

Upgrade.Title: Hikaru Sulu
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked and you performed a Green Maneuver this round, perform a [SENSOR ECHO] Action. You may use this Action even if your ship does not have the [SENSOR ECHO] Action on its Action Bar. You may only use the 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver Template for this Action.

Upgrade.Title: Self-Destruct Sequence
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: You cannot attack this round. At the end of the next Activation Phase, after all ships have moved, destroy your ship and roll a number of attack dice equal to your Hull value to damage every ship within Range 1 of your ship. These ships do not roll defense dice against this damage. You cannot use the Cheat Death [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade in conjunction with this Action. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Federation ship.

Upgrade.Title: Montgomery Scott
Upgrade.Ability: At any time, you may disable this card to prevent 1 Auxiliary Power Token from being placed beside your ship. OR ACTION: Discard this card to immediately repair up to 2 damage to your ship's Hull.

Upgrade.Title: Pavel Chekov
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Modify Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may disable this card to re-roll all of your blank results. You must keep the results of the second roll.

Upgrade.Title: Nyota Uhura
Upgrade.Ability: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may disable this card to add +2 to your Captain's Skill Number until the End Phase.

Upgrade.Title: Goval
Upgrade.Ability: Discard this card at any time to prevent 1 of your other [CREW] Upgrades from being discarded or disabled. If this Upgrade is deployed to a ship with a Borg Captain, you must spend 1 Drone Token to use this ability.

Upgrade.Title: Bosus
Upgrade.Ability: If an enemy ship causes any of your [CREW] Upgrades to be discarded, place those Upgrades face down beneath this card. ACTION: Discard this card and all the cards beneath it. For each card that was discarded by this Action (including this card), you gain +1 attack die when attacking with your Primary Weapon this round. If this Upgrade is deployed to a ship with a Borg Captain, you must spend 2 Drone Tokens to use this Action.

Upgrade.Title: Crosis
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target a ship at Range 1. Disable 1 [CREW] or 1 [TECH] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship. Then steal 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice from that ship, even if the Upgrade exceeds your ship's restrictions. If this Upgrade is deployed to a ship with a Borg Captain, you must spend 2 Drone Tokens to perform this Action.

Upgrade.Title: Torsus
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to increase your Captain's Skill Number by +2 until the End Phase. If this Upgrade is deployed to a ship with a Borg Captain, you must spend 1 Drone Token to perform this Action.

Upgrade.Title: Diversionary Tactics
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card and one of your [CREW] Upgrades to target a ship that is within Range 1-2 of your ship and not in your forward firing arc. Target ship must discard 1 of its [CREW] Upgrades (of its choice) and cannot attack your ship this round.

Upgrade.Title: Experimental Link
Upgrade.Ability: During the Modify Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard this card and either spend up to 3 of your Drone Tokens OR disable up to 3 of your [CREW] Upgrades to re-roll a number of your attack dice equal to the number of Drone Tokens you spend or [CREW] Upgrades you disabled with this card. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Borg Captain.

Upgrade.Title: Subspace Distortion
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, instead of rolling your normal defense dice, roll a number of defense dice equal to your starting Shield value. During the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may re-roll a number of your blank results equal to your Active Shields. You cannot attack this round.

Upgrade.Title: Transwarp Conduit
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to remove your ship from the play area and discard all Tokens that are beside your ship except Auxiliary Power Tokens. During the End Phase, place your ship back in the play area. You cannot place your ship within Range 1-3 of any enemy ship. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Borg ship.

Upgrade.Title: Unnecessary Bloodshed
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target every friendly ship within Range 1-3 (and your ship). During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, each target ship chooses one of its attack dice and places it on a [HIT] result. These dice may not be rolled or re-rolled this round. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Dominion Captain.

Upgrade.Title: Lamat'Ukan
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship has already acquired a Target Lock on an enemy ship, during the Declare Target step of the Combat Phase, you may discard this card to remove your [TARGET LOCK] Tokens and acquire a Target Lock on a different enemy ship as a free Action. Normal Target Lock rules apply.

Upgrade.Title: Remata'Klan
Upgrade.Ability: At the end of the Activation Phase, if your ship is in the forward firing arcs of at least 2 enemy ships within Range 1-3 of your ship, you may discard this card to add +2 to your Captain's Skill Number until the End Phase. Gain +2 attack dice for all of your attacks during the round in which you use this Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Amat'Igan
Upgrade.Ability: Each time you defend, roll +1 defense dice. Whenever an enemy Upgrade would cause one of your other [CREW] Upgrades to be discarded, you must discard this card instead.

Upgrade.Title: Sensor Array
Upgrade.Ability: During the Modify Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend your [SCAN] Token to force 1 enemy ship to re-roll one of its attack dice of your choice.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK [TARGET LOCK]: Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. If the target ship is damaged by this attack, destroy 1 additional Active Shield on that ship (if possible). If fired from a Borg ship, add +1 attack die.

Upgrade.Title: Forward Weapons Array
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Discard this card to target up to 3 ships in your forward firing arc. Make a separate attack with this weapon against each of those ships. If you attack 1 ship with this weapon, add +3 attack dice to that attack. If you attack 2 ships with this weapon, add +1 die to each attack. This Upgrade costs +5 SP if purchased for any non-Borg ship.

Upgrade.Title: Volley of Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. You may disable 1 of your other Dominion Torpedo Upgrades and make one additional attack with it. You do not need to have the 2nd ship target locked or spend a 2nd target lock to make this extra attack. Both attacks must be made against different targets in your forward or rear firing arcs. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Jem'Hadar Battle Cruiser or Battleship.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. If fired from a Jem'Hadar Battle Cruiser, add +1 attack die. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Combat Vessel Variant
Upgrade.Ability: Your Primary Weapon and Hull values are each at +1. In addition, during the Activation Phase, if you reveal a 4 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver, you may perform a 5 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver instead. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Suurok Class ship.

Upgrade.Title: Tractor Beam
Upgrade.Ability: If you are attacked at Range 1, you may disable this card to force the attacking ship to re-roll up to 2 attack dice of your choice.

Upgrade.Title: Diplomacy
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target 1 enemy ship within Range 1-3. Discard all Tokens from beside your ship and the target ship (except for Auxiliary Power Tokens). Both your ship and the target ship cannot attack or be attacked this round.

Upgrade.Title: Koss
Upgrade.Ability: While Koss is on your ship, none of your other Upgrades can be affected by your opponents.

Upgrade.Title: Mutli-adaptive Shields
Upgrade.Ability: This upgrade only functions while you have Active Shields. Each time you defend, roll +1 defense die. When defending, you roll your full defense dice in spite of the presence of an enemy ship's [SCAN] token. In addition, you roll your full defense against any Minefield Tokens. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Federation ship.

Upgrade.Title: Reinforced Structural Integrity
Upgrade.Ability: Each time your ship takes damage, place 1 of the damage cards that your ship receives beneath this card. All excess damage affects the ship as normal. You cannot place critical damage cards beneath this card. Once there are 3 damage cards beneath this card, discard this Upgrade and all cards beneath it. This Upgrade costs +5 SP for any ship other than the U.S.S. Raven.

Upgrade.Title: Research Mission
Upgrade.Ability: During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may disable this card to roll +1 defense die.

Upgrade.Title: Erin Hansen
Upgrade.Ability: During the Planning Phase, after all ships have chosen their Maneuvers, you may discard this card to target one enemy ship at Range 1-3 and look at that ship's chosen Maneuver. You may then change your Maneuver. The target ship cannot change its Maneuver after you look at it.

Upgrade.Title: Quark
Upgrade.Ability: At the start of the game, place 1 non-Borg [TECH] Upgrade with a cost of 5 or less face down beneath this card. At any time, you may discard Quark to flip the Upgrade that is beneath this card face up and deploy it to your ship, even if it exceeds your ship's restrictions.

Upgrade.Title: Quark
Upgrade.Ability: At the start of the game, place 1 non-Borg [WEAPON] Upgrade with a cost of 5 or less face down beneath this card. At any time, you may discard Quark to flip the Upgrade that is beneath this card face up and deploy it to your ship, even if it exceeds your ship's restrictions.

Upgrade.Title: Odo
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-3 (even if that ship is Cloaked or has Active Shields). Disable this card and one Upgrade on the target ship. If the Upgrade you disabled is a [CREW] Upgrade, you may then use that Upgrade's Action (if any) as a free Action this round.

Upgrade.Title: Vic Fontaine
Upgrade.Ability: This Upgrade counts as either a [CREW] or [TECH] Upgrade (your choice). If an enemy Upgrade would affect one of your [CREW] Upgrades, roll 2 defense dice. If you roll at least 1 [EVASIVE] result, ignore the effects of the enemy Upgrade. You do not pay a Faction penalty when deploying this Upgrade to a Federation ship.

Upgrade.Title: Vic Fontaine
Upgrade.Ability: This Upgrade counts as either a [CREW] or [TECH] Upgrade (your choice). If an enemy Upgrade would affect one of your [CREW] Upgrades, roll 2 defense dice. If you roll at least 1 [EVASIVE] result, ignore the effects of the enemy Upgrade. You do not pay a Faction penalty when deploying this Upgrade to a Federation ship.

Upgrade.Title: T'Kar
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discards this card and 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship. Then disable the Captain Card and all remaining [CREW] upgrades on the target ship. While the Captain Card is disabled, the target ship has a Skill of 1.

Upgrade.Title: T'Rul
Upgrade.Ability: Add 1 Tech Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. While your ship is cloaked, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may choose to roll 3 less defense dice and add 1 [EVASIVE] result to your defense roll. If the Cloaking Device upgrade card is deployed to T'Rul's ship, you do not need to disable that card when you perform the Action listed on it.

Upgrade.Title: Elim Garak
Upgrade.Ability: During the Modify Defense step of the Combat Phase, you may disable this card to add 1 [EVASIVE] result to your defense roll. You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning Elim Garak or his [TALENT] Upgrade to your ship. If Elim Garak is ever disabled or discarded, you cannot use his [TALENT] Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Julian Bashir
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Move a Disabled Upgrade Token from one of your disabled [CREW] or [TECH] Upgrades to one of your non-disabled [CREW] or [TECH] upgrades. You may then immediately perform the Action (if any) listed on the Upgrade that you moved the token from as a free Action.

Upgrade.Title: Enhanced Hull Plating
Upgrade.Ability: During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, if your ship is not Cloaked and you have no Active Shields, you may add up to 2 [EVADE] results to your defense roll. If you do so, place 1 Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship for each [EVADE] result you added with this Upgrade. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Federation ship. You cannot deploy more than 1 Enhanced Hull Plating [TECH] Upgrade to any ship.

Upgrade.Title: T'Pol
Upgrade.Ability: Add 1 [TECH] slot to your Upgrade Bar. When attacking with your Primary Weapon, if there is a [SCAN] Token beside your ship, you may disable this card to force the defending ship to roll -2 defense dice against your attack (instead of -1 defense die). You do not pay a Faction penalty when deploying this card to a Vulcan Ship.

Upgrade.Title: Malcolm Reed
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, you may disable this card and discard 1 of your Secondary Weapon Upgrades to add +2 attack dice to your attack.

Upgrade.Title: Hoshi Sato
Upgrade.Ability: When defending, if there is a [SCAN] Token beside your ship, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase you may disable this card to force the attacking ship to roll 1 less attack die.

Upgrade.Title: Charles Tucker III
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not in the forward firing arc of any enemy ships, repair 1 damage to your ship's Hull.

Upgrade.Title: Travis Mayweather
Upgrade.Ability: During the Activation Phase, if you reveal a 2 or 3 Bank Maneuver, you may disable this card to change it to a Turn Maneuver. If you do so, treat it as a Red Maneuver. The number and direction of the new Maneuver remain the same.

Upgrade.Title: Phlox
Upgrade.Ability: During the Activation Phase, you may disable this card to remove all Disabled Upgrade Tokens from all of your other [CREW] Upgrades.

Upgrade.Title: Tactical Alert
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking or defending, you may discard this card and spend a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token to re-roll any number of your attack or defense dice.

Upgrade.Title: Vulcan Commandos
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard this card and any number of your other Vulcan Commandos [CREW] Upgrades. For each of your [CREW] Upgrades that you discarded with this Action disable 1 Upgrade of your choice on the target ship AND gain +1 attack die this round against that ship. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Vulcan Ship.

Upgrade.Title: Combat Vessel Variant
Upgrade.Ability: Your Primary Weapon and Hull Values are at +1. In addition, add 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Suurok Class ship. You cannot deploy more than 1 Combat Vessel Variant [TECH] Upgrade to any ship.

Upgrade.Title: Tractor Beam
Upgrade.Ability: If you are attacked at Range 1, during the Modify Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may disable this card to force the attacking ship to re-roll 1 of its attack dice of your choice.

Upgrade.Title: Decisive Action
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you attack an enemy ship this round whose Captain has a lower Skill Number than yours, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard this card to choose 2 of your attack dice and place them both on [HIT] results. These dice cannot be rolled or re-rolled this round.

Upgrade.Title: Third of Five
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. Discard this card and disable all [CREW] Upgrades on the target ship. This ability may be used against a ship that is Cloaked. You cannot deploy this card to the same ship or fleet as Hugh.

Upgrade.Title: Second of Five
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. Discard this card and 1 Upgrade of your choice on the target ship. This ability may be used against a ship that is Cloaked.

Upgrade.Title: Fourth of Five
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. Discard this card and disable up to 2 Shields on the target ship. Then disable up to 2 Upgrades of your choice on that ship. This ability may be used against a ship that is Cloaked.

Upgrade.Title: Subspace Beacon
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to target every friendly ship within Range 1-3 of your ship. Target ship(s) may immediately perform a [SCAN] Action as a free Action. Then place 1 [SCAN] Token beside your ship.

Upgrade.Title: Long Range Scan
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking a ship at Range 3, if there is a [SCAN] Token beside your ship, during the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase you may disable this card to convert 1 of your opponent's [EVADE] or [BATTLESTATIONS] results to a blank result.

Upgrade.Title: Scavenged Parts
Upgrade.Ability: Whenever one of your Upgrades is discarded, add 1 Drone Token to your Captain Card. You cannot exceed your Captain's starting number of Drone Tokens. You cannot deploy more than 1 Scavenged Parts [BORG] Upgrade to any ship.

Upgrade.Title: Aft Phase Cannon
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this cad to perform this attack. This Weapon can only be fired from your rear firing arc.

Upgrade.Title: Photonic Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Magnetometric Guided Charge
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert 1 of your [BATTLESTATIONS] results into a [CRITICAL] result. Target ship does not roll defense dice against this attack. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Borg ship.

Upgrade.Title: Secondary Impulse Reactor
Upgrade.Ability: During the Activation Phase, if you reveal a Red Maneuver and you have an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship, you may disable this card to perform that Maneuver with no penalty.

Upgrade.Title: Jack Crusher
Upgrade.Ability: During the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard this card and spend 1 [EVASIVE MANEUVERS] Token to add 2 [EVADE] results to your roll.

Upgrade.Title: Picard Maneuver
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you performed a 3 [STRAIGHT], a 4 [STRAIGHT], or a 5 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver this round, discard this card and immediately perform an additional 5 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. All attacks against your ship this round are at -4 attack dice.

Upgrade.Title: Regeneration Sequencers
Upgrade.Ability: Whenever one of your Upgrades is discarded, repair 1 damage to your Hull. OR You may discard this card and spend 1 Drone Token to repair up to 2 damage to your Hull.

Upgrade.Title: We Won't Go Back!
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship, its Captain, or any of its Upgrades are targeted by an Upgrade on an enemy ship, you may discard this card before that Upgrade takes effect to immediately make 1 free attack against that ship, if possible. If the enemy ship is destroyed by this free attack, the enemy Upgrade does not take effect.

Upgrade.Title: Worf
Upgrade.Ability: If you inflict at least 1 damage (normal or critical) to an enemy ship during the Deal Damage step of the Combat Phase, you may discard this card to inflict 1 additional normal damage to that ship.

Upgrade.Title: Tactical Station
Upgrade.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. When attacking, you may disable this card to gain +1 attack die until the End Phase. OR When attacking, you may discard this card to gain +2 attack dice until the End Phase.

Upgrade.Title: Fire All Weapons
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK [TARGET LOCK]: Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs. You may immediately make 1 additional attack with your Primary Weapon at a different enemy ship, if possible. This Upgrade costs +5 SP for any ship other than a Galaxy, Intrepid or Sovereign Class ship.

Upgrade.Title: Quantum Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. If the target ship is hit, add 1 [HIT] result to your total damage. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Biogenic Charge
Upgrade.Ability: You must use 1 [BORG] and 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade slot to deploy this Upgrade to your ship. ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. In addition to normal damage, the opposing ship must discard 1 of its [CREW] Upgrades of its choice for each damage you inflict to that ship's Hull with this attack (max 2). Add 1 Drone Token to your Captain Card for each [CREW] Upgrade that was discarded with this attack. You cannot exceed your starting number of Drone Tokens.

Upgrade.Title: Biogenic Charge
Upgrade.Ability: You must use 1 [BORG] and 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade slot to deploy this Upgrade to your ship. ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. In addition to normal damage, the opposing ship must discard 1 of its [CREW] Upgrades of its choice for each damage you inflict to that ship's Hull with this attack (max 2). Add 1 Drone Token to your Captain Card for each [CREW] Upgrade that was discarded with this attack. You cannot exceed your starting number of Drone Tokens.

Upgrade.Title: Thought Maker
Upgrade.Ability: During the Planning Phase, after every ship has been assigned a Maneuver Dial, you may discard this card to target a ship within Range 1-2. If you do so, look at that ship's Maneuver Dial and change it to any of its 1 or 2 Green Maneuvers (your choice). That Maneuver Dial cannot be changed nor can its player look at it until it is that ship's turn to activate. The target ship's player may place an Auxiliary Power Token beside the target ship to ignore the new Maneuver and not move that round. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Ferengi ship.

Upgrade.Title: Vengeance
